ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 (14.5 ounce) cans French-style green beans, drained

cookingTips: Use a drinkable white wine for best flavor
Simmer gently to reduce wine and concentrate flavors
Don't overcook canned green beans or they'll become mushy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple side dish elevates canned green beans with wine and garlic. How will you balance the acidity of the wine with the vegetable's natural flavor?
